be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.user

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.user.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginViewController.Listener

    public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoginViewController.Listener
    Login controller class handles the login view with a register or a connection option of a user. Once the register of a user option is chosen, the RegisterController class will handle it. For the connection option, it will delegates the Home Scene to the HomeController class.
